title: Gudetama: An Eggcellent Adventure
overview: A lethargic, empathetic road movie about finding one's parents â€” for everyone who just wants to laze about!Having resigned itself to the fact that it will just end up on someone's plate, Gudetama just wants to be lazy all the time. But, swept up by the go-getting, overbearing chick Shakipiyo, it leaves the refrigerator and heads out into the world. Together, these polar opposites go on an adventure to find their mother!
